name: Roll or Die (Jentin)
description:
Roll or Die

Made for GMTK 2022 48 hour game jam.

Contols: W/S to to move up and down.

Avoid obstacles. If you hit one the dice comes to a stop and if it lands on a 1 its gameover.  Land on the 2, 3, 4, 5 sides and  you can continue rolling, but that side is changed to a 1 for future rolls. 6's allow you to continue rolling at no cost. Move around the board to avoid the obstacles for as long as you can. Be careful though, fall off the table and its gameover.

Credits:

Jentin - Programming

CannedPineapple - Art

Software Used:

Unity

Asesprite

Visual Studio
